title: Wear Shortcut Launcher
summary: Launch shortcuts of your phone or tablet from Android Wear.
description: Wear Shortcut Launcher is a launcher app for Android Wear.You can start from the Android Wear by registering shortcuts of phone and tablet.For example, you can control the smartphone from Android Wear by registering the Task of Tasker.In addition, there is no limitation to the shortcut that can be registered, all of the shortcuts can be registered.If you wish to support the application of the translation, please contact the developer.
descriptionHTML:
Wear Shortcut Launcher is a launcher app for Android Wear.
You can start from the Android Wear by registering shortcuts of phone and tablet.
For example, you can control the smartphone from Android Wear by registering the Task of Tasker.
In addition, there is no limitation to the shortcut that can be registered, all of the shortcuts can be registered.

If you wish to support the application of the translation, please contact the developer.
comments: Nice! Hey, how about more customisation options? Maybe a black background?
Perfect I really like this app, especially when paired with the other app QuickShortcutMaker.
Good app, would be great if we could reorder the shortcuts
